titleStmt.title: The plaine ma[ns] spirituall plough Containing the godly and spirituall husbandrie. Wherein euery Christian ought to be exercised, for the happie encrease of fruite, to eternall life. By I.C. preacher of the word.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, John, d. 1621.

notesStmt.note: First word in title is xylographic.
Imperfect: title page mutilated with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
